verses.text:
\w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* ye of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of the latter \w rain|strong="H4456"\w*; \add so\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w make|strong="H6213"\w* bright \w clouds|strong="H2385"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them \w showers|strong="H1653"\w* of \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, to every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w grass|strong="H6212"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.  +  r 10.1  t bright…: or, lightnings *

For the \w idols|strong="H8655"\w* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w vanity|strong="H0205"\w*, and the \w diviners|strong="H7080"\w* have \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* a \w lie|strong="H8267"\w*, and have \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*; they \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* in \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*: therefore they \w went|strong="H5265"\w* their way as a \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, they were \w troubled|strong="H6031"\w*, because \add there was\add* no \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*.\f + \fr 10.2 \ft idols: Heb. teraphims\f*\f + \fr 10.2 \ft were…: or, answered that, etc\f*

Mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, and I \w punished|strong="H6485"\w* the \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* his \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and hath \w made|strong="H7760"\w* them as his \w goodly|strong="H1935"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* in the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 10.3 \ft punished: Heb. visited upon\f*

Out of him came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w corner|strong="H6438"\w*, out of him the \w nail|strong="H3489"\w*, out of him the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, out of him every \w oppressor|strong="H5065"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

¶ And they shall be as \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \add men\add*, which tread \w down|strong="H0947"\w* \add their enemies\add* in the \w mire|strong="H2916"\w* of the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* in the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: and they shall \w fight|strong="H3898"\w*, because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* with them, and the \w riders|strong="H7392"\w* on \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* shall be \w confounded|strong="H3001"\w*.\f + \fr 10.5 \ft the riders…: or, they shall make the riders on horses ashamed\f*

And I will \w strengthen|strong="H1396"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and I will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, and I will bring them again to \w place|strong="H3427"\w* them; for I have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* upon them: and they shall be as \w though|strong="H0834"\w* I had not cast them \w off|strong="H2186"\w*: for I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and will \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* them.

And \add they of\add* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* shall be like a \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \add man\add*, and their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* as through \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*: yea, their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*; their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

I will \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w* for them, and \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* them; for I have \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* them: and they shall \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* as they have \w increased|strong="H7235"\w*.

And I will \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* them among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and they shall \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* me in far \w countries|strong="H4801"\w*; and they shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w* with their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

I will bring them \w again|strong="H7725"\w* also out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* them out of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*; and I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* and \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*; and \add place\add* shall not be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* for them.

And he shall pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* with \w affliction|strong="H6869"\w*, and shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w waves|strong="H1530"\w* in the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and all the \w deeps|strong="H4688"\w* of the \w river|strong="H2975"\w* shall dry \w up|strong="H3001"\w*: and the \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* shall be brought \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and the \w sceptre|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall depart \w away|strong="H5493"\w*.

And I will \w strengthen|strong="H1396"\w* them in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and they shall walk up and \w down|strong="H1980"\w* in his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
